Search the B.C. Data Catalogue

Source: R/bcdc_search.R
bcdc_search.Rd

Search the B.C. Data Catalogue

bcdc_search(
  ...,
  license_id = NULL,
  download_audience = "Public",
  res_format = NULL,
  sector = NULL,
  organization = NULL,
  n = 100
)

Arguments

...

search terms
license_id

the type of license (see bcdc_search_facets("license_id")).
download_audience

download audience (see bcdc_search_facets("download_audience")). Default "Public"
res_format

format of resource (see bcdc_search_facets("res_format"))
sector

sector of government from which the data comes (see bcdc_search_facets("sector"))
organization

government organization that manages the data (see bcdc_search_facets("organization"))
n

number of results to return. Default 100

Value

A list containing the records that match the search

Examples

# \donttest{
try(
  bcdc_search("forest")
)

#> Found 275 matches. Returning the first 100.
#> To see them all, rerun the search and set the 'n' argument to 275.
#> List of B.C. Data Catalogue Records
#> Number of records: 100
#>  (Showing the top 10)
#> Titles:
#> 1: Forest Development Units (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: 25bbc9a6-f0eb-47dd-849c-3161a6512468
#>  Name: forest-development-units
#> 2: Harvested Areas of BC (Consolidated Cutblocks) (other, fgdb, wms,
#>  kml, pdf)
#>  ID: b1b647a6-f271-42e0-9cd0-89ec24bce9f7
#>  Name: harvested-areas-of-bc-consolidated-cutblocks-
#> 3: RESULTS - Forest Cover Silviculture (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: 258bb088-4113-47b1-b568-ce20bd64e3e3
#>  Name: results-forest-cover-silviculture
#> 4: RESULTS - Forest Cover Inventory (other, wms)
#>  ID: 56ac43a7-724a-4f01-b193-d5f9a16ef0a8
#>  Name: results-forest-cover-inventory
#> 5: Forest Tenure Managed Licence (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: c3e96239-cdc9-4328-ac19-58fba1623ef8
#>  Name: forest-tenure-managed-licence
#> 6: Pest Infestation Polygons (other, zip)
#>  ID: 450b67bb-02d5-4526-8bc0-ac7924125a1e
#>  Name: pest-infestation-polygons
#> 7: Pest Infestation Points (other)
#>  ID: 4a83ec61-31a4-4134-9204-af47ff26ed78
#>  Name: pest-infestation-points
#> 8: Forest Tenure Harvesting Authority Polygons (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: cff7b8f7-6897-444f-8c53-4bb93c7e9f8b
#>  Name: forest-tenure-harvesting-authority-polygons
#> 9: Generalized Forest Cover Ownership (wms, kml, other)
#>  ID: 5fc4e8ce-dd1d-44fd-af17-e0789cf65e4e
#>  Name: generalized-forest-cover-ownership
#> 10: FDU - Forest Licence Reference (other)
#>  ID: 7e986391-c740-4d1b-9294-7576af2d2998
#>  Name: fdu-forest-licence-reference
#> 
#> Access a single record by calling `bcdc_get_record(ID)` with the ID
#>  from the desired record.

try(
  bcdc_search("regional district", res_format = "fgdb")
)

#> List of B.C. Data Catalogue Records

#>  (Showing the top 10)
#> Titles:

#>  from the desired record.
# }
